title: Gold 4 Jungle and Mid duo LF Flex/Tourney team
body:
As the title says, we're a gold jungle and mid lane duo looking for people around the same rank to play flex and community tourneys with.
Hit us up in game

IGN's
Brindyyy
geebeegees

replies.body: I have a team i will be starting up for the new year called, Team Digital Fury, so far its very small, but we're looking for players like ourselves who wish to better at the game we love and one day be a official team for the OCE label.  If you want to ask any questions about it feel free to add me in game -shouri. {{sticker:sg-ezreal}}
